title: client
description: A client as seen by SalesKing

number.description: Unique number, assigned from SK numbering scheme.

organisation.description: Name of a company. At least this or the lastname field must be filled for new records

last_name.description: Last name of a person. At least this or the organisation field must be filled for new records

gender.description: Can be empty for a company. Is used in salutation

position.description: Position of a person in a company.

title.description: Academical title of a person e.g. Dr., Prof

tax_number.description: Tax number, normaly applies to a private person

vat_number.description: VAT number, for a company or person paying value added taxes.

url.description: An url associated with the person, e.g its company website.

created_at.description: Date the record was created in SK. Never changes afterwards.

updated_at.description: Last date when the record was edited.

bank_iban.description: IBAN Number of the bank account. Is validated

lock_version.description: Increased on every edit, so SK can detect/prevent a concurrent edit by another user. First save wins.

cash_discount.description: Default cash discount for new invoices.

due_days.description: Default due days for new invoices.

address_field.description: Returns the address field used on new docs. Consist of Organisation name and default(first) address

addresses.description: A client can have many addresses, sorted by date descending(new first). Default address is the most recent one.
